testcase.classname: Doctor my profile - Process of add operations for all details
testcase.name: Test the Mobile Number Update in Personal Detail Section
testcase.system-out: Given Validate the browser..................................................passed Given User click on loginsignup button......................................passed Given User should be able to click on i have account button.................passed Then User clicks on Login with Password button..............................passed When user enters the mobile number as 8530906851 mobile number..............passed When user enters the password as Test@123 password..........................passed Then User clicks on proceed button..........................................passed Given User click on profile icon............................................passed Given User click on mobile edit icon........................................passed Given User enter the mobile number as 6530906852 and click on get otp button.passed When Popup should come and user can add OTP As 1 2 3 4......................passed When User should be able to click on otp proceed button and get mobile number change successfull message as Successfully updated Personal information and Contact details!.passed When User Click on personal and contact details tab for update mobile number.passed Given User click on mobile edit icon again..................................passed Given User enter the mobile number as 8530906851 and click on get otp button.passed When Popup should come and user can add OTP As 1 2 3 4......................passed When User should be able to click on otp proceed button and get mobile number change successfull message as Successfully updated Personal information and Contact details!.passed Then closes the browser.....................................................passed
